title: Income and Employment Data Simplified
text: Build next-generation products and services for your customers with easy, real-time data connectivity to their payroll or HRMS through a single API

section.title: Regulatory Frameworks
section.content: Regulation is an asset, not a barrier. That is why Tartan is currently undergoing ISO 27701, ISO 27001 audits. Tartan is committed to maintaining and achieving the highest levels of security standards

section.title: Encryption Standards
section.content: Powered by AWS KMS which is a secure and resilient service that uses hardware security modules that have been validated under FIPS 140-2, or are in the process of being validated, to protect your keys
